title: 服务器重启报错 不定时重启
author: The　sun
txt_content:
15.05 19:02:14 [Multicraft] Starting server!
15.05 19:02:14 [Multicraft] Loading server properties
15.05 19:02:13 [Multicraft] Server stopped
15.05 19:02:13 [Multicraft] Retrying server startup
15.05 19:02:08 [Disconnect] User Thc_sun has disconnected, reason: Server shutting down
15.05 19:02:08 [Disconnect] User HPPPPP has disconnected, reason: Server shutting down
15.05 19:02:08 [Disconnect] User vlan has disconnected, reason: Server shutting down
15.05 19:02:08 [Disconnect] User shuaibilin has disconnected, reason: Server shutting down
15.05 19:02:08 [Multicraft] Server stopped
15.05 19:02:08 [Multicraft] Server shut down
15.05 19:02:08 [Multicraft] Error writing to server: [Errno 22] Invalid argument
15.05 19:02:08 [Multicraft] Error writing to server: [Errno 22] Invalid argument
15.05 19:02:08 [Multicraft] Stopping server!
15.05 19:02:08 [Multicraft] Server shut down
15.05 19:02:08 [Multicraft] Error writing to server: [Errno 22] Invalid argument
15.05 19:02:08 [Multicraft] Error writing to server: [Errno 22] Invalid argument
服务器不定时重启让我很头疼 这个貌似就报错的关键 [Errno 22] 谁知道 怎么修复这个东西
{:10_494:}
